calendar.CalendarApp.name: CalendarApp
calendar.CalendarApp.doc: CalendarApp Allows a script to read and update the user's Google Calendar. This class provides direct access to the user's default calendar, as well as the ability to retrieve additional calendars that the user owns or is subscribed to.

property.name: Color
property.doc: An enum representing the named colors available in the Calendar service.

property.name: GuestStatus
property.doc: An enum representing the statuses a guest can have for an event.

property.name: Month
property.doc: An enum representing the months of the year.

property.name: Visibility
property.doc: An enum representing the visibility of an event.

property.name: Weekday
property.doc: An enum representing the days of the week.

method.name: createAllDayEvent
method.doc: Creates a new all-day event.

argument.name: title
argument.doc: the title of the event

argument.name: date
argument.doc: the date of the event (only the day is used; the time is ignored)

method.name: createAllDayEvent
method.doc: Creates a new all-day event.

argument.name: title
argument.doc: the title of the event

argument.name: date
argument.doc: the date of the event (only the day is used; the time is ignored)

argument.name: options
argument.doc: a JavaScript object that specifies advanced parameters, as listed below

method.name: createAllDayEventSeries
method.doc: Creates a new all-day event series.

argument.name: title
argument.doc: the title of the events in the series

argument.name: startDate
argument.doc: the date of the first event in the series (only the day is used; the time is ignored)

argument.name: recurrence
argument.doc: the recurrence settings of the event series

method.name: getAllCalendars
method.doc: Gets all calendars that the user owns or is subscribed to.

method.name: getAllOwnedCalendars
method.doc: Gets all calendars that the user owns.

method.name: getCalendarById
method.doc: Gets the calendar with the given ID.

argument.name: id
argument.doc: the calendar ID

method.name: getCalendarsByName
method.doc: Gets all calendars with a given name that the user owns or is subscribed to.

argument.name: name
argument.doc: the calendar name

method.name: getColor
method.doc: Gets the color of the calendar.

method.name: getDefaultCalendar
method.doc: Gets the user's default calendar.

method.name: getDescription
method.doc: Gets the description of the calendar.

method.name: getEventSeriesById
method.doc: Gets the event series with the given ID.

argument.name: iCalId
argument.doc: ID of the event series

method.name: getEvents
method.doc: Gets all events that occur within a given time range.

argument.name: startTime
argument.doc: the start of the time range

argument.name: endTime
argument.doc: the end of the time range, non-inclusive

method.name: getEvents
method.doc: Gets all events that occur within a given time range and meet the specified criteria.

argument.name: startTime
argument.doc: the start of the time range

argument.name: endTime
argument.doc: the end of the time range, non-inclusive

argument.name: options
argument.doc: a JavaScript object that specifies advanced parameters, as listed below

method.name: getEventsForDay
method.doc: Gets all events that occur on a given day.

argument.name: date
argument.doc: the date to retrieve events for (only the day is used; the time is ignored)

method.name: getEventsForDay
method.doc: Gets all events that occur on a given day and meet specified criteria.

argument.name: date
argument.doc: the date to retrieve events for (only the day is used; the time is ignored)

argument.name: options
argument.doc: advanced filtering options

method.name: getId
method.doc: Gets the ID of the calendar.

method.name: getName
method.doc: Gets the name of the calendar.

method.name: getOwnedCalendarById
method.doc: Gets the calendar with the given ID, if the user owns it.

argument.name: id
argument.doc: the calendar id

method.name: getOwnedCalendarsByName
method.doc: Gets all calendars with a given name that the user owns.

argument.name: name
argument.doc: the calendar name

method.name: getTimeZone
method.doc: Gets the time zone of the calendar.

method.name: isHidden
method.doc: Determines whether the calendar is hidden in the user interface.

method.name: isMyPrimaryCalendar
method.doc: Determines whether the calendar is the default calendar for the effective user.

method.name: isOwnedByMe
method.doc: Determines whether the calendar is owned by the effective user.

method.name: isSelected
method.doc: Determines whether the calendar's events are displayed in the user interface.

method.name: newRecurrence
method.doc: Creates a new recurrence object, which can be used to create rules for event recurrence.

method.name: setColor
method.doc: Sets the color of the calendar.

argument.name: color
argument.doc: a hexadecimal color string ("#rrggbb") or a value from CalendarApp.Colors

method.name: setDescription
method.doc: Sets the description of the calendar.

argument.name: description
argument.doc: the description of this calendar

method.name: setHidden
method.doc: Sets whether the calendar is visible in the user interface.

argument.name: hidden
argument.doc: true to hide the calendar in the user interface; false to show it

method.name: setName
method.doc: Sets the name of the calendar.

argument.name: name
argument.doc: the new name

method.name: setSelected
method.doc: Sets whether the calendar's events are displayed in the user interface.

argument.name: selected
argument.doc: true to show the calendar's events in the user interface; false to hide them

method.name: setTimeZone
method.doc: Sets the time zone of the calendar.

argument.name: timeZone
argument.doc: the time zone, specified in "long" format (e.g., "America/New_York", as listed by Joda.org)

method.name: subscribeToCalendar
method.doc: Subscribes the user to the calendar with the given ID, if the user is allowed to subscribe.

argument.name: id
argument.doc: the ID of the calendar to subscribe to

method.doc: Subscribes the user to the calendar with the given ID, if the user is allowed to subscribe.

argument.name: id
argument.doc: the ID of the calendar to subscribe to

argument.name: options
argument.doc: a JavaScript object that specifies advanced parameters, as listed below

calendar.CalendarEvent.name: CalendarEvent
calendar.CalendarEvent.doc: CalendarEvent Represents a single calendar event.

method.name: addEmailReminder
method.doc: Adds a new email reminder to the event.

argument.name: minutesBefore
argument.doc: the number of minutes before the event

method.name: addGuest
method.doc: Adds a guest to the event.

argument.name: email
argument.doc: the email address of the guest

method.name: addPopupReminder
method.doc: Adds a new popup reminder to the event.

argument.name: minutesBefore
argument.doc: the number of minutes before the event

method.name: addSmsReminder
method.doc: Adds a new SMS reminder to the event.

argument.name: minutesBefore
argument.doc: the number of minutes before the event

method.name: anyoneCanAddSelf
method.doc: Determines whether anyone can invite themselves.

method.name: deleteEvent
method.doc: Deletes the event.

method.name: deleteTag
method.doc: Deletes a key/value tag from the event.

argument.name: key
argument.doc: the tag key

method.name: getAllDayEndDate
method.doc: Gets the date on which this all-day calendar event ends.

method.name: getAllDayStartDate
method.doc: Gets the date on which this all-day calendar event begins.

method.name: getAllTagKeys
method.doc: Gets all keys for tags that have been set on the event.

method.name: getCreators
method.doc: Gets the creators of the event.

method.name: getDateCreated
method.doc: Gets the date the event was created.

method.name: getDescription
method.doc: Gets the description of the event.

method.name: getEmailReminders
method.doc: Gets the minute values for all email reminders for the event.

method.name: getEndTime
method.doc: Gets the date and time at which this calendar event ends.

method.name: getEventSeries
method.doc: Gets the series of recurring events that this event belongs to.

method.name: getGuestByEmail
method.doc: Gets a guest by email address.

argument.name: email
argument.doc: the address of the guest

method.name: getGuestList
method.doc: Gets the guests for the event, not including the event owner.

method.name: getGuestList
method.doc: Gets the guests for the event, potentially including the event owners.

argument.name: includeOwner
argument.doc: whether to include the owners as a guest

method.name: getId
method.doc: Gets the ID of the event.

method.name: getLastUpdated
method.doc: Gets the date the event was last updated.

method.name: getLocation
method.doc: Gets the location of the event.

method.name: getMyStatus
method.doc: Gets the event status (attending, etc.) of the effective user.

method.name: getOriginalCalendarId
method.doc: Get the ID of the calendar where this event was originally created.

method.name: getPopupReminders
method.doc: Gets the minute values for all popup reminders for the event.

method.name: getSmsReminders
method.doc: Gets the minute values for all SMS reminders for the event.

method.name: getStartTime
method.doc: Gets the date and time at which this calendar event begins.

method.name: getTag
method.doc: Gets a tag value of the event.

argument.name: key
argument.doc: the key

method.name: getTitle
method.doc: Gets the title of the event.

method.name: getVisibility
method.doc: Gets the visibility of the event.

method.name: guestsCanInviteOthers
method.doc: Determines whether guests can invite other guests.

method.name: guestsCanModify
method.doc: Determines whether guests can modify the event.

method.name: guestsCanSeeGuests
method.doc: Determines whether guests can see other guests.

method.name: isAllDayEvent
method.doc: Determines whether this is an all-day event.

method.name: isOwnedByMe
method.doc: Determines whether the event is owned by the effective user.

method.name: isRecurringEvent
method.doc: Determines whether the event is part of an event series.

method.doc: Removes all reminders from the event.

method.doc: Removes a guest from the event.

argument.doc: the email address of the guest

method.doc: Resets the reminders using the calendar's default settings.

calendar.EventGuest.name: EventGuest
calendar.EventGuest.doc: EventGuest Represents a guest of an event.

method.doc: Gets the number of additional people that this guest has said will attend.

method.doc: Gets the email address of the guest.

calendar.EventRecurrence.name: EventRecurrence
calendar.EventRecurrence.doc: EventRecurrence Represents the recurrence settings for an event series.

method.name: addDailyExclusion
method.doc: Adds a rule that excludes occurrences on a daily basis.

method.name: addDailyRule
method.doc: Adds a rule that causes the event to recur on a daily basis.

method.name: addDate
method.doc: Adds a rule that causes the event to recur on a specific date.

method.name: addDateExclusion
method.doc: Adds a rule that excludes an occurrence for a specific date.

method.name: addMonthlyExclusion
method.doc: Adds a rule that excludes occurrences on a monthly basis.

method.name: addMonthlyRule
method.doc: Adds a rule that causes the event to recur on a monthly basis.

method.name: addWeeklyExclusion
method.doc: Adds a rule that excludes occurrences on a weekly basis.

method.name: addWeeklyRule
method.doc: Adds a rule that causes the event to recur on a weekly basis.

method.name: addYearlyExclusion
method.doc: Adds a rule that excludes occurrences on a yearly basis.

method.name: addYearlyRule
method.doc: Adds a rule that causes the event to recur on a yearly basis.

method.name: setTimeZone
method.doc: Sets the time zone for this recurrence.

argument.name: timeZone
argument.doc: the time zone, specified in "long" format (e.g., 'America/New_York', as listed by Joda.org)

calendar.RecurrenceRule.name: RecurrenceRule
calendar.RecurrenceRule.doc: RecurrenceRule Represents a recurrence rule for an event series. Note that this class also behaves like the EventRecurrence that it belongs to, allowing you to chain rule creation together like so: recurrence.addDailyRule().times(3).interval(2).addWeeklyExclusion().times(2); Modifiers like times(times) and interval(interval) are applied to the most recently added rule.

method.name: addDailyExclusion
method.doc: Adds a rule that excludes occurrences on a daily basis.

method.name: addDailyRule
method.doc: Adds a rule that causes the event to recur on a daily basis.

method.name: addDate
method.doc: Adds a rule that causes the event to recur on a specific date.

method.name: addDateExclusion
method.doc: Adds a rule that excludes an occurrence for a specific date.

method.name: addMonthlyExclusion
method.doc: Adds a rule that excludes occurrences on a monthly basis.

method.name: addMonthlyRule
method.doc: Adds a rule that causes the event to recur on a monthly basis.

method.name: addWeeklyExclusion
method.doc: Adds a rule that excludes occurrences on a weekly basis.

method.name: addWeeklyRule
method.doc: Adds a rule that causes the event to recur on a weekly basis.

method.name: addYearlyExclusion
method.doc: Adds a rule that excludes occurrences on a yearly basis.

method.name: addYearlyRule
method.doc: Adds a rule that causes the event to recur on a yearly basis.

method.name: interval
method.doc: Configures the rule to only apply at this interval of the rule's time unit.

argument.name: interval
argument.doc: the interval in the rule's time unit

method.name: onlyInMonth
method.doc: Configures the rule to only apply to a specific month.

argument.name: month
argument.doc: the month

method.name: onlyInMonths
method.doc: Configures the rule to only apply to specific months.

argument.name: months
argument.doc: the months

method.name: onlyOnMonthDay
method.doc: Configures the rule to only apply to a specific day of the month.

argument.name: day
argument.doc: the day of the month

method.name: onlyOnMonthDays
method.doc: Configures the rule to only apply to specific days of the month.

argument.name: days
argument.doc: the days of the month

method.name: onlyOnWeek
method.doc: Configures the rule to only apply to a specific week of the year.

argument.name: week
argument.doc: the week

method.name: onlyOnWeekday
method.doc: Configures the rule to only apply to a specific day of the week.

argument.name: day
argument.doc: the day of the week

method.name: onlyOnWeekdays
method.doc: Configures the rule to only apply to specific days of the week.

argument.name: days
argument.doc: the days of the week

method.name: onlyOnWeeks
method.doc: Configures the rule to only apply to specific weeks of the year.

argument.name: weeks
argument.doc: the weeks

method.name: onlyOnYearDay
method.doc: Configures the rule to only apply to a specific day of the year.

argument.name: day
argument.doc: the day of the year

method.name: onlyOnYearDays
method.doc: Configures the rule to only apply to specific days of the year.

argument.name: days
argument.doc: the days of the year

method.name: setTimeZone
method.doc: Sets the time zone for this recurrence.

argument.name: timeZone
argument.doc: the time zone, specified in "long" format (e.g., 'America/New_York', as listed by Joda.org)

method.name: times
method.doc: Configures the rule to end after a given number of occurrences.

argument.name: times
argument.doc: the number of times to recur

method.name: until
method.doc: Configures the rule to end on a given date (inclusive).

method.name: weekStartsOn
method.doc: Configures which day a week starts on, for the purposes of applying the rule.

argument.name: day
argument.doc: the day on which the week will start

calendar.Color.name: Color
calendar.Color.doc: Color An enum representing the named colors available in the Calendar service.

calendar.GuestStatus.name: GuestStatus
calendar.GuestStatus.doc: GuestStatus An enum representing the statuses a guest can have for an event.

property.name: INVITED
property.doc: The guest has been invited, but has not indicated whether he or she will attend.

property.name: MAYBE
property.doc: The guest has indicated he or she might attend.

property.name: NO
property.doc: The guest has indicated he or she will not attend.

property.name: OWNER
property.doc: The guest is the owner of the event.

property.name: YES
property.doc: The guest has indicated he or she will attend.

calendar.Visibility.name: Visibility
calendar.Visibility.doc: Visibility An enum representing the visibility of an event.

property.name: CONFIDENTIAL
property.doc: The event is private. This value is provided for compatibility reasons.

property.name: DEFAULT
property.doc: Uses the default visibility for events on the calendar.

property.name: PRIVATE
property.doc: The event is private and only event attendees may view event details.

property.name: PUBLIC
property.doc: The event is public and event details are visible to all readers of the calendar.
